start.text: The overbearing pressure and atmosphere of the battlefield... Not a fan of it.
I just wanna nap in the aft... I know I shouldn't.
*sigh* I'm too tired for this. Can I rest for longer if I end this quickly?
It's still my position, so I'll be giving orders, I guess.
How did I end up doing things like this...

start_boss.text: I'm being serious about this, if you couldn't tell...
Guess I gotta show some effort to win this, at least...

retreat.text: Withdrawing. Maybe now, I can get some sleep...
Gonna retreat now, so I can get a nap in...

out_of_missiles.text: Out of missiles... Now this'll take longer...

engaged.text: Ah, I hope they go easy on someone as listless as me...
It's still my job and all... So I'm trying, at least.
I'm doing my best to fight here, despite how I seem...

need_help.text: This is starting to get risky... *Sigh* ...I wanna retreat.
Maybe we shouldn't have strained ourselves too much.

pursuing.text: I'm not the biggest fan of this rule where someone has to win...
I don't really like that I have to keep doing more of this.
Maybe they should've tried not letting their guard down.

running.text: *Sigh* We're gonna step back, for a moment...
How did I end up needing to do this...

hull_90.text: This is getting more and more risky... *Sigh* Why can't we retreat?
*Sigh* All I wanted was to catch a quick break...
...I just wanna get this over with...

hull_50.text: Under heavy fire... *Sigh* I'm being serious about this, if you couldn't tell...
Fire's getting heavier... Can't catch a break.

hull_30.text: I'm sure this isn't how my crew wanted to die, either... *Sigh*
I'm doing my best here, despite how it looks...

overload.text: Too much flux, again... Why can't we just retreat?

death.text: Ah... Why's the end always just an empty void...
Results aside, I guess I can sleep tight now...
...Sorry I couldn't help much, I guess...

victory.text: They all must've fought hard to live. Probably were more desperate than I am...
...I can call it a day now, yeah?
*Sigh* It's not too happy to be the winners, but good work anyways.
